content.content: 1. In section 138 of the Act, “Saturday” shall be deemed to include any day on which offices of mining recorders are closed as a result of measures implemented under the Social Contract Act, 1993.  O. Reg. 492/93, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. In section 138 of the Act, “Saturday” shall be deemed to include any day on which offices of mining recorders are closed as a result of measures implemented under the Social Contract Act, 1993.  O. Reg. 492/93, s. 1.
